"Lead Border-Breaker":
"The mysterious machines we encountered in
the city have appeared in the Subterranean
Tunnels.
If we allow these border-breaking objects to
remain, they may begin to pose a threat to
operatives on unrelated missions.
All ARKS are to deploy as soon as able.
Locate and destroy the targets.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires."
